item.title: 华润创业、GoldenTree 收购 Intesa CRE 相关风险转移业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Christofferson Robb & Co.和 GoldenTree Asset Management 公司将投资于 Intesa Sanpaolo SpA 公司的重大风险转移项目，该项目涉及约 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的债务组合。【原文：Christofferson Robb & Co. and GoldenTree Asset Management are set to invest in an Intesa Sanpaolo SpA significant risk transfer that’s linked to a debt portfolio of about €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说比亚迪将聘请前 Stellantis 英国公司老板负责欧洲业务拓展
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国比亚迪股份有限公司正在聘用Stellantis NV公司的前英国主管，这家电动汽车制造商正在组建一支欧洲高管团队，以领导其在该地区的扩张。【原文：China’s BYD Co. is hiring the former UK chief of Stellantis NV, according to people familiar with the matter, as the EV maker builds a team of European executives to lead its expansion in the region.】

item.title: B.Riley 资产出售获得 2.36 亿美元用于偿还债务
item.description: B.莱利金融公司（B. Riley Financial Inc. ）在不到一个月的时间内完成了第二笔交易，以筹集现金和削减债务负担，这次是通过剥离其稳定的消费品牌的权利来筹集 2.36 亿美元。该公司股价在纽约早盘交易中上涨超过 8%。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. sealed its second deal in less than a month to raise cash and cut its debt load, this time collecting $236 million by divesting rights to its stable of consumer brands. Electricity demand is soaring, and that’s prolonging coal’s contribution to the energy mix.

】

item.title: 蕾切尔-里夫斯的英国增税预算需要注意什么？
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）为自己设定了看似矛盾的任务：结束公共服务领域的紧缩政策、促进经济增长和实现财政稳定，以向市场保证工党在英国财政方面值得信赖。【原文：Rachel Reeves has set herself the seemingly contradictory tasks of ending austerity in public services, boosting growth and delivering fiscal stability to reassure markets that Labour can be trusted with the UK’s finances.】

item.description:

item.title: 葛兰素史克与中国生物技术公司达成红斑狼疮交易，金额高达 8.5 亿美元
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）以高达8.5亿美元的价格收购了中国生物技术公司奇美健生物科技公司（Chimagen Biosciences）的一种实验性药物，为这家英国制药商的狼疮潜在治疗产品线增添了新的成员。【原文：GSK Plc acquired an experimental drug from Chinese biotech firm Chimagen Biosciences for as much as $850 million, adding to the British drugmaker’s pipeline of potential treatments for lupus.】

item.title: Blackstone 新直接借贷基金融资 220 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博社看到的一份声明称，Blackstone Inc. 为新的直接借贷基金筹集了约 220 亿美元的资金，包括预期的杠杆作用，该基金以机构投资者为目标。【原文：Blackstone Inc. amassed about $22 billion of capital, including anticipated leverage, for a new direct lending fund targeting institutional investors, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 尼日利亚最大银行计划在国内出售美元证券
item.description: 尼日利亚最大的银行正在考虑在国内市场出售美元证券，以资助其扩张计划并满足中央银行制定的资本规定。【原文：Nigeria’s biggest bank is considering selling dollar-denominated securities in the domestic market to fund its expansion plans and meet capital rules set by the central bank.】

item.title: 汇丰银行因偿还遗留资本而损失 3 亿美元
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）周二公布的第三季度财报显示，该行因决定偿还遗留资本问题而损失了 3 亿美元。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has booked a $300 million hit on a legacy capital issue that it decided to repay, the bank reported on Tuesday in what was otherwise a better-than-expected third-quarter set of results.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 CYVN 将入股运动型汽车制造商迈凯轮
item.description: 阿布扎比支持的投资公司 CYVN Holdings LLC 已签署初步协议，将入股英国豪华汽车制造商迈凯轮，并完全控制其汽车业务。【原文：CYVN Holdings LLC, an investment firm backed by Abu Dhabi, has signed a preliminary deal to take a stake in British luxury carmaker McLaren and take full control of its automotive business.】

item.title: 达里奥将沙特阿拉伯王储比作邓小平和李光耀
item.description: 桥水联合创始人雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）周二称沙特阿拉伯事实上的统治者穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）为 "伟大的领袖"，并将他比作中国的邓小平和新加坡的李光耀。【原文：Bridgewater Associates Founder Ray Dalio on Tuesday called Saudi Arabia’s de-facto ruler Mohammed bin Salman a “great leader,” and likened him to China’s Deng Xiaoping and Singapore’s Lee Kuan Yew.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比飓风米尔顿影响前景黯淡
item.description: 受飓风米尔顿的影响，皇家加勒比游轮有限公司本季度的利润展望低于预期，公司股价下跌。【原文：Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd.’s shares dropped after its profit outlook for this quarter fell short of expectations due to the impact of Hurricane Milton.】

item.title: Alphabet 需要的不仅仅是强劲的业绩，更多的是驯服忧虑之墙
item.description: 几个月来，Alphabet 公司的股价一直没有起色，落后于 "华丽七姐妹 "中的其他公司，原因是投资者难以估计该公司面临的风险。要相信周二的财报会消除这些担忧，还有些牵强。【原文：Alphabet Inc. shares have gone nowhere for months, trailing Magnificent Seven peers as investors struggle to price risks confronting the company. It’s a stretch to believe Tuesday’s results will blow away those concerns.】

item.title: 欧元区两个风向标经济体上季度实现扩张
item.description: 爱尔兰第三季度经济反弹，比利时经济持续扩张，这些都是本周即将公布的欧元区数据的积极预兆。【原文：Ireland’s economy rebound in the third quarter while Belgium kept expanding, positive omens for euro-zone data due this week.】

item.title: 喜马拉雅山宿舍里的程序员打造了不丹首个人工智能机器人
item.description: 生成式人工智能的浪潮一直席卷到喜马拉雅山的高处，不丹王国在这里拥有了第一家也是唯一一家人工智能初创公司。但首先...【原文：The generative AI wave has swept all the way up to the high reaches of the Himalayas, where the kingdom of Bhutan has its first and only artificial intelligence startup. But first...】

The Canadian company, which has traditionally targeted mom-and-pops, is wooing larger retailers like Mattel.

item.title: Milei 的改革让首席执行官们对阿根廷抱有一线希望
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）就任总统初期，大众汽车公司南美区负责人对他并不满意。现在，他与其他商界领袖一样，多年来第一次对阿根廷感到鼓舞。【原文：In the early days of Javier Milei’s presidency, Volkswagen AG’s South America chief wasn’t too happy with him. Now he’s part of a chorus of business leaders feeling encouraged about Argentina for the first time in years.】

item.title: 荷兰监管机构寻求更好的算法测试以避免市场滥用
item.description: 荷兰金融市场管理局正与欧洲证券和市场管理局及其他监管机构合作，评估交易公司如何改进算法测试，以确保它们不会以非故意的方式行事或导致市场秩序混乱。【原文：The Dutch Authority for the Financial Markets is working with the European Securities and Markets Authority and other supervisors to assess how trading firms can improve algorithm testing to ensure they do not behave in an unintended manner or contribute to disorderly market conditions.】

item.title: Maire 首席执行官权衡绿色技术部门挖掘价值的各种选择
item.description: 意大利工程技术集团 Maire SpA 首席执行官亚历山德罗-贝尼尼（Alessandro Bernini）表示，该集团正在权衡各种方案，以发掘其 NextChem 部门的价值。【原文：Italian engineering and tech group Maire SpA is weighing options to unearth value at its NextChem division, Chief Executive Officer Alessandro Bernini said.】

item.title: 私募股权投资对人工智能的下一个赌注是核能
item.description: 世界上一些最大的私人资本管理公司正在为核电站融资和投资，它们抓住了部分由科技巨头电力密集型人工智能雄心推动的核电行业复兴的机遇。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest managers of private capital are making moves to finance and invest in nuclear power plants, latching onto a revival in the sector driven in part by tech giants’ electricity-intensive AI ambitions.】

item.title: 因美国大选猜测而进行的交易进入超速状态
item.description: 在美国大选前一周，华尔街正忙于分析下一任总统对市场的影响。投资手册被翻了个底朝天，从陷入僵局的国会到关税对通胀的影响，等等，无所不包。【原文：A week before the US election, Wall Street is falling over itself trying to suss out what the next president means for markets. Investment playbooks are being dusted off, gaming out everything from a gridlocked Congress to the impact of tariffs on inflation, and more.】

item.title: 风暴和罢工将使美联储会议和大选前的最后一份就业报告复杂化
item.description: 周五的就业报告是美联储下周召开政策会议前的最后一份报告。但数据将很难解析。【原文：Friday’s employment report is the last the Federal Reserve will see before its policy meeting next week. But the data will be tough to parse.】

item.title: S.非洲反垄断机构阻止沃达康 7.45 亿美元光纤交易
item.description: 南非反垄断法庭禁止沃达康集团有限公司（Vodacom Group Ltd. ）以 132 亿兰特（7.45 亿美元）收购 Remgro 有限公司光纤业务股份的交易。【原文：South Africa’s antitrust tribunal prohibited Vodacom Group Ltd.’s 13.2 billion-rand ($745 million) deal to buy a stake in Remgro Ltd.’s fiber businesses.】

item.title: 德国 LBBW 银行出售与贷款挂钩的 SRT，交易额创历史新高
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴登一符腾堡州银行正在出售一项与约 28 亿欧元（30 亿美元）贷款组合相关的重大风险转移。【原文：Landesbank Baden-Württemberg is selling a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of about €2.8 billion ($3 billion) of loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国 "即买即付 "金融科技公司向资产抵押贷款市场迈出一步
item.description: Zilch Technology Ltd. 的首席财务官表示，在扩大现有债务交易并引入新投资者后，这家 "现购现付 "贷款公司距离发行首只公开评级的资产支持证券又近了一步。【原文：Zilch Technology Ltd.’s chief financial officer says the buy-now-pay-later lender is one step closer to issuing its first publicly-rated asset-backed security after expanding an existing debt deal and bringing on new investors.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司利润跃升 663%，得益于机场，新能源
item.description: 由于机场和新能源部门的强劲表现抵消了煤炭贸易业务的拖累，阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd. ）公布的季度利润激增近八倍。股价上涨。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd. posted a nearly eight-fold surge in quarterly profit, as a strong show by airports and new energy units offset the drag from coal trading business. Shares rose.】

item.title: 夏季暴跌后诺和诺德股价有望超越礼来股价
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）今年在肥胖症药物股市大赢家的竞争中落后于礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.分析师预计这家丹麦公司将开始迎头赶上。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S has fallen behind Eli Lilly & Co. this year in the race to be the big stock market winner from obesity drugs. Analysts expect the Danish company to start catching up.】
